001package net.tvburger.jdl.plots.listeners;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.EpochRegime;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.DataRenderer;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
010
011import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;
012
013public class EpochRmePlotter implements DataRenderer {
014
015    private final AtomicInteger PLOT_COUNTER = new AtomicInteger(0);
016
017    private final Plot rmePlot = new Plot("RME");
018
019    public static EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener createListener() {
020        return createListener(null);
021    }
022
023    private String createUniqueModelName() {
024        return "Model-" + PLOT_COUNTER.incrementAndGet();
025    }
026
027    public static EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener createListener(String name) {
028        EpochRmePlotter plot = new EpochRmePlotter();
029        plot.display();
030        return plot.attach(name == null ? plot.createUniqueModelName() : name);
031    }
032
033    public EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener attach() {
034        return attach(createUniqueModelName(), null);
035    }
036
037    public EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener attach(String name) {
038        return attach(name, null);
039    }
040
041    public EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener attach(String name, DataSet<?> validationSet) {
042        return new EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener() {
043            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
044            @Override
045            public <N extends Number> void epochCompleted(EpochRegime epochRegime, int currentEpoch, TrainableFunction<N> model, DataSet<N> trainingSet, Optimizer<? extends TrainableFunction<N>, N> optimizer) {
046                synchronized (EpochRmePlotter.this) {
047                    rmePlot.addToSeries(name, new float[]{currentEpoch}, new float[]{calculateRme(model, validationSet == null ? trainingSet : (DataSet<N>) validationSet)});
048                    rmePlot.redraw();
049                }
050            }
051        };
052    }
053
054    private <N extends Number> float calculateRme(TrainableFunction<N> model, DataSet<N> samples) {
055        float mse = 0.0f;
056        for (DataSet.Sample<N> sample : samples) {
057            Array<N> estimate = model.estimate(sample.features());
058            float sumSquaredErrors = 0.0f;
059            for (int i = 0; i < estimate.length(); i++) {
060                float error = estimate.get(i).floatValue() - sample.targetOutputs().get(i).floatValue();
061                sumSquaredErrors += error * error;
062            }
063            float meanSquaredError = sumSquaredErrors / estimate.length();
064            mse += (float) Math.sqrt(meanSquaredError) / samples.size();
065        }
066        return mse;
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public void display() {
071        rmePlot.display();
072    }
073}
